body: @Kami Nana Well, the artists in the eastern countries do hentai as a form of unoffical practice than their offical public works. So, these people do it on a more regular basis than an average American, Brit, or any other western guy. Their might be some other big reasons I'm not privy too, but it's the general gist of things.

Man o.p com was really something.
Lemme say this, this is an hentai and i like the world building of the entire o.p com series 😂
